description:
Your main objective is to help Polandball here! Break through Earth's atmosphere and reach for the Moon to prove other countryballs once and for all they were wrong and conquer the final frontier!
This is not going to be an easy task as you have a huge target on your back!

Upgrade Polandball's Rocket
Build a strategy on how you will conquer the space! You have to choose between 56 items
33 perks to enhance your rocket
Choose wisely before you spend your money
Rare Memes
They are rare but you will found them...eventually
25 countryballs enemies with different behavior and AI
Learn about each country. Learn their behavior. Learn how to avoid them.
Create your own countryballs.
This will affect your game strategy
Collect coins, fuel, burgers, and magnets
You will do anything to survive in space!
Amazing End Movie for fans who finish the game
For die-hard fans
name: Polandball: Can Into Space
